jobDescription: AtriCure, Inc. provides innovative technologies for the treatment of Atrial Fibrillation (Afib) and related conditions. Afib affects more than 33 million people worldwide. Electrophysiologists and cardiothoracic surgeons around the globe use AtriCure technologies for the treatment of Afib and reduction of Afib related complications. AtriCure’s Isolator® Synergy™ Ablation System is the first and only medical device to receive FDA approval for the treatment of persistent Afib. AtriCure’s AtriClip Left Atrial Appendage (LAA) Exclusion System products are the most widely sold LAA management devices worldwide, with more than 100,000 implanted to date. For more information, visit AtriCure.com or follow us on Twitter @AtriCure. Position Summary: The Minimally Invasive Manager will be focused on the adoption of AtriCure’s ablation technologies during cardiac surgical procedures via a minimally invasive approach. The Minimally Invasive Manager is responsible for prospecting, qualifying, and closing direct business sales in the cardiothoracic operating room, EP Cath Lab, Interventional Cath Lab and related departments within the hospitals. This role must be able to work with sales teams and individuals within designated geography to develop, train and support physicians’ and their staff in various procedures and utilization of AtriCure technologies. Establish meetings and make presentations to top hospital administration to educate important stake holders on AtriCure’s products and key initiatives. This position requires excellent organization, relationship management, team work and strategic planning with their designated teams.
